title: Does This Photo Show a Boy Forced to Sleep on the Floor of an English Hospital?
subtitle: Two waves of social media posts cast doubt in the minds of some over the authenticity of a story that proved a major moment in the 2019 U.K. general election.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A photograph published in December 2019 showed a boy forced to sleep on a hospital floor in Leeds, England, due to overcrowding.
